Specimen Type: EDTA blood (2–5 mL), fresh or frozen tissue (≤100 mg), or cultured cells (≥1 × 10^6 viable cells)
Purpose: To perform full gene sequencing of the BPGM gene for detection and interpretation of genetic variants.
Container: EDTA blood collection tube or sterile container appropriate for tissue/cell samples
Equipment: Thermocycler, Nanodrop spectrophotometer, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus, DNA sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq), computer with sequencing analysis software
